edge: In this movie, Katrina Kaif portrays the character of Diya Kapoor in her adulthood.
Tunisha Sharma plays the younger version of Katrina Kaif's character, Diya Kapoor.
Sidharth Malhotra essays the role of Jai Varma in this movie.
Jason Dsouza portrays the young version of Sidharth Malhotra's character, Jai Varma.
In this movie, Sayani Gupta is seen portraying the character of Chitra.
Kirti Adarkar plays the character of Suman in this movie.
Taaha Shah portrays the role of Tarun Bhalla in this movie.
In this movie, Rohan Joshi plays the character of Raj.
Rajit Kapur appears as Panditji in a special appearance in this movie.
Ram Kapoor essays the role of Vinod Kapoor, Diya's father in this movie.
In this movie, Sarika portrays the character of Varsha Varma, Jai's mother.
In the flash-forward scenes, Sagar Arya plays Nikhil Khanna, Diya's second husband.
